text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n + 1 ] , i ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; } int index = 0 ; long long int count = 1 ; for ( i = 2 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] < a [ i - 1 ] ) { index = i - 1 ; count ++ ; } else { count += i - index ; } } printf ( "%lld\n" , count ) ; } return 0 ; }
